item.title: Knight Online Assassin Macro Guide - Perfect Combo Experience with Kozy Macro
item.description: For players using Assassin (Rogue) characters in Knight Online, one of the most critical elements is combos performed with precise timing. Performing a perfect assassin combo manually is extremely difficult and exhausting. This is where Kozy Macro’s Assassin Combo feature comes into play. What is Assassin Macro? Assassin macro is an intelligent system specially developed for rogue characters in Knight Online and Rise Online, which tracks skill cooldown times and can perform first-class assassin combos.
